about_the_game:
Story

Since childhood, Titi has always admired the moon and dreams of becoming the first frog to reach it. Despite being mocked by others who think it’s impossible for a small frog to achieve such a lofty goal, Titi remains steadfast and believes wholeheartedly in this dream.

One day, Titi discovers an old book titled "All About the Moon" in the basement. From this book, Titi learns that gathering "moonlight energy" is the key to reaching the moon. This energy comes from the whimsical dreams of frogs—dreams that seem impossible in reality. To collect this moonlight energy, Titi decides to open an inn.

How to Play

Players have 30 days to help Titi operate the inn and gather moonlight energy. By fulfilling requests related to crafting, cooking, and decorating, the Moonlight Frog Inn will gradually grow, attracting more guests. Among these guests are those struggling with their dreams. To help these guests experience whimsical dreams, players must listen to their stories and complete specific quests. Depending on Titi’s actions, the guests' dreams will vary. By making the right choices, players can guide the guests to have the desired dreams, thus collecting more moonlight energy.
detailed_description:
Story

Since childhood, Titi has always admired the moon and dreams of becoming the first frog to reach it. Despite being mocked by others who think it’s impossible for a small frog to achieve such a lofty goal, Titi remains steadfast and believes wholeheartedly in this dream.

One day, Titi discovers an old book titled "All About the Moon" in the basement. From this book, Titi learns that gathering "moonlight energy" is the key to reaching the moon. This energy comes from the whimsical dreams of frogs—dreams that seem impossible in reality. To collect this moonlight energy, Titi decides to open an inn.

How to Play

Players have 30 days to help Titi operate the inn and gather moonlight energy. By fulfilling requests related to crafting, cooking, and decorating, the Moonlight Frog Inn will gradually grow, attracting more guests. Among these guests are those struggling with their dreams. To help these guests experience whimsical dreams, players must listen to their stories and complete specific quests. Depending on Titi’s actions, the guests' dreams will vary. By making the right choices, players can guide the guests to have the desired dreams, thus collecting more moonlight energy.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM

name: Moonlight Frog Inn

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 +
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 450 GTS / Radeon HD 5750
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 9.1+ or OpenGL 3.2+
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GTX 750 / Radeon HD 7800
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: DirectX 9.1+ or OpenGL 3.2+

short_description: Moonlight Frog Inn is a simulation game where Titi, a frog who dreams of reaching the moon, runs an inn to make that dream a reality.
supported_languages: English, Korean, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
